text: Sabine Schmitz (; 14 May 1969 â€“ 16 March 2021) was a German professional motor racing driver and television personality. She was known for racing BMW and Porsche. She also appeared on BBC's Top Gear, making many appearances alongside several of the programme's presenters. In 2017, Schmitz was diagnosed with cancer. She died from the disease on 16 March 2021 at a hospital in Trier, Germany at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German racecar drivers Category:German television personalities Category:Cancer deaths in Germany
title: Sabine Schmitz
